--- title: VisRecTrans keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A library for creating custom vision transformers for computer vision problems" description: "A library for creating custom vision transformers for computer vision problems" nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install transcv

How to use

Some examples :

{% raw %} 
from transcv.visrectrans import VisRecTrans
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
vis_rec_ob = VisRecTrans('vit_small_patch16_224', 10, False)
model = vis_rec_ob.create_model()
vis_rec_ob.initialize(model)
{% endraw %}

Now, the model can be used with the Learner API, of fastai, and can be fine-tuned on any dataset.
